person.persName: Thomas T. Sharp (Covington, KY, capt 7th KY Cav USA)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, soldier. Ohio native. Son of John Sharp and Harriet Sharp. Student in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Served in 7th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A) as a captain from August 18, 1862, to October 12, 1862.
